snippet: Blazer told a judge in 2013 that he and others on FIFA’s executive committee had accepted bribes for their support in the bidding to host the 1998 and 2010 World Cups.
abstract: Former FIFA member Chuck Blazer admitted to judge in 2013 that he had taken bribes from bidders seeking to host 1998 and 2010 World Cups; his guilty plea led to latest indictments of FIFA officials on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Blazer told a judge in 2013 that he and others on FIFA’s executive committee had accepted bribes for their support in the bidding to host the 1998 and 2010 World Cups.

headline.main: Ex-FIFA Official Chuck Blazer Admitted Accepting Bribes for World Cup Votes
